name.hu: A Tomb of the Mask feloldása
name.ja: トゥーム・オブ・ザ・マスクのブロック解除
name.th: ทอมบ์ออฟเดอะมาสก์ถูกปลดล็อก
name.vi: Mở khóa Tomb of the Mask
name.zh_CN: 解锁《刺客信条大革命》的坟墓

short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Tomb of the Mask Unblocked as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!
short.bg: Играйте Tomb of the Mask Unblocked като разширение за Chrome - Можете да играете и без Интернет, опитайте сега!
short.ca: Juga a Tomb of the Mask desbloquejat com a extensió de Chrome - També pots jugar sense connexió a Internet, prova-ho ara!
short.cs: Hrajte Tomb of the Mask Unblocked jako rozšíření pro Chrome - také můžete hrát bez internetu, vyzkoušejte to hned teď!
short.da: Spil Tomb of the Mask Unblocked som en Chrome-udvidelse - Du kan også spille uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de: Juega a Tomb of the Mask desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome. Además, ¡puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.el: Juega a Tomb of the Mask desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome. También puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet. ¡Pruébalo ahora!
short.es: Juega a Tomb of the Mask desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome - También puedes jugar sin internet, ¡pruébalo ahora!
short.et: Cheza Tomb of the Mask Unblocked kama kifaa cha Chrome - Pia unaweza kucheza bila uhusiano wa intaneti, jaribu sasa!
short.fi: Pelaa Tomb of the Mask Unblocked -peliä Chrome-lisäosana - Voit myös pelata ilman internet-yhteyttä, kokeile nyt!
short.fil: Maglaro ng Tomb of the Mask Unblocked bilang isang Chrome extension - Puwede rin maglaro nang walang internet, subukan mo na!
short.fr: Jouez à Tomb of the Mask débloqué en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !
short.he: Juega a la versión desbloqueada de Tomb of the Mask como extensión de Chrome. Además, también puedes jugar sin conexión a Internet.…
short.hi: Juega Tomb of the Mask Desbloqueado como una extensión de Chrome - ¡También puedes jugar sin internet, pruébalo ahora!
short.hr: Igrajte Tomb of the Mask Unblocked kao Chrome proširenje - Također možete igrati bez interneta, isprobajte odmah!
short.hu: Játszd a Tomb of the Mask Unblocked játékot Chrome kiterjesztésként - Próbáld ki, hogy internet nélkül is játszhatsz!
short.id: Mainkan Tomb of the Mask Unblocked sebagai ekstensi Chrome - Juga dapat dimainkan tanpa koneksi internet, coba sekarang!
short.it: Gioca a Tomb of the Mask sbloccato come estensione di Chrome - Puoi anche giocare senza internet, provalo ora!
short.ja: Chrome拡張機能としてTomb of the Mask Unblockedをプレイできます - インターネットに接続せずにもプレイできます。今すぐお試しください！
short.ko: Chrome 확장 프로그램으로 암호의 무덤 언블록드 플레이 - 또한 인터넷 없이도 플레이 가능합니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite "Tomb of the Mask Unblocked" kaip "Chrome" plėtinį - Taip pat galima žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!
short.lv: Spēlējiet "Tomb of the Mask Unblocked" kā "Chrome" paplašinājumu - varat arī spēlēt bez interneta, pamēģiniet tagad!
short.ms: Mainkan Tomb of the Mask yang tidak terhalang sebagai sambungan Chrome - Juga boleh dimainkan tanpa Internet, cuba sekarang!
short.nl: Speel Tomb of the Mask Unblocked als een Chrome-extensie - Je kunt het ook spelen zonder internet, probeer het nu!
short.no: Speel Tomb of the Mask Unblocked as 'n Chrome-uitbreiding - Jy kan ook sonder internet speel, probeer dit nou!
short.pl: Graj w Tomb of the Mask Unblocked jako rozszerzenie Chrome - Możesz też grać bez dostępu do internetu, spróbuj teraz!
short.ro: Jucați Tomb of the Mask Unblocked ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, puteți juca fără internet, încercați acum!
short.ru: Играйте в игру "Tomb of the Mask Unblocked" как расширение для Chrome. Вы также можете играть без интернета, попробуйте прямо…
short.sk: Hrajte hru Tomb of the Mask Unblocked ako Chrome rozšírenie - Môžete ju tiež hrať bez pripojenia na internet, vyskúšajte teraz!
short.sl: Igrajte Tomb of the Mask Unblocked kot dodatek za Chrome - Igrajte tudi brez interneta, preizkusite zdaj!
short.sr: Играйте Томб оф тхе Маск Унблоцкед као Хром додатак - Такође можете играти без интернета, пробајте одмах!
short.sv: Spela Tomb of the Mask avblockerad som en Chrome-tillägg - kan också spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Tomb of the Mask Unblocked ในรูปแบบของส่วนขยาย Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตด้วย ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!
short.tr: Tomb of the Mask'ın engellenmemiş bir Chrome uzantısı olarak oynamak - Ayrıca İnternetsiz oynanabilir, şimdi deneyin!
short.uk: Грайте в Tomb of the Mask Unblocked як розширення для Chrome - Також можна грати без Інтернету, спробуйте зараз!
short.vi: Chơi Tomb of the Mask Unblocked như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần Internet, thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 作为Chrome扩展程序播放《无尽之墓：解锁版》- 也可以离线播放，立即尝试！
short.zh_TW: 使用 Chrome 擴充功能來玩解鎖的《墓穴之盾》- 也可以在沒有網路的情況下進行遊戲，立即試試！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⚔️🔒 Tomb of the Mask Unblocked - Unleash the Adventure on Chrome! 🕹️🌟

Embark on an exhilarating journey into the Tomb of the Mask Unblocked, now ready for action on Chrome! Dive into a retro-inspired arcade labyrinth, where swift moves and quick thinking are your key to conquering endless challenges. Can you unlock the mysteries, avoid traps, and emerge as the ultimate adventurer? 🏺💎

🌈 Retro-Inspired Labyrinth:
Immerse yourself in the pixelated charm of Tomb of the Mask Unblocked. Navigate through a constantly evolving maze, filled with traps, treasures, and an array of vibrant colors that will transport you back to the golden age of arcade gaming! 🎮🌟

🎭 Swift and Intuitive Gameplay:
Experience fast-paced, one-finger gameplay that keeps you on the edge of your seat. Slide through the labyrinth, avoid obstacles, and collect gems with responsive controls that make every move a thrilling adventure! ⚡🕹️

🏆 Unearth Treasures and High Scores:
Delve into the tomb's depths, collecting precious gems and uncovering secrets along the way. Challenge your friends or compete globally to achieve the highest scores and prove your mettle as the Tomb of the Mask champion! 💰🥇

🎶 Retro Arcade Soundtrack:
Groove to the beats of an energetic retro arcade soundtrack that perfectly complements your journey. The music heightens the excitement, creating an immersive experience as you navigate the labyrinth! 🎵🔊

🚀 Why Tomb of the Mask Unblocked?

🕹️ Instantly accessible on Chrome - no waiting, just retro gaming fun!
🌟 Nostalgic pixelated graphics for an authentic arcade experience.
⚔️ Master the labyrinth and become the ultimate Tomb Raider!
👉 How to Begin Your Retro Adventure:

Click "Add to Chrome" to launch Tomb of the Mask Unblocked.
Navigate the labyrinth, avoid traps, and collect gems.
Challenge friends, achieve high scores, and become the Tomb of the Mask champion!
🚨 Ready for an unforgettable journey? Add Tomb of the Mask Unblocked to your Chrome browser now and let the retro adventure unfold! ⚔️🕹️🔓
